metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20321 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition accessing file object in the Linux kernel OverlayFSsubsystem was found in the way users do rename in specific way withOverlayFS. A local user could use this flaw to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
